edge: In this movie, Shashi Kapoor plays the role of Rajeev, a civil engineer.
Padmini Kolhapure portrays the character of Young Roopa in this film.
In the movie, Zeenat Aman acts as Roopa.
Kanhaiyalal depicts Pandit Shyam Sunder, a village priest in this film.
A. K. Hangal performs the role of Bansi, Roopa's uncle in this movie.
In this film, Padmini Kolhapure appears as the younger version of Roopa.
David Abraham Cheulkar enacts the character of Bade Babu in this movie.
In this film, Leela Chitnis portrays the role of Bade Babu's wife.
Vishwa Mehra appears as Jai Singh in this movie.
In this film, Sheetal enacts the character of Champa.
Monika appears as Roopa's friend in this movie.
Subroto Mahapatra depicts Shastry, Roopa's prospective father-in-law in this film.
In this movie, Javed Khan appears as Shastry's son.
Tun Tun performs the role of Fat Lady in this film.
